item.title: My First Post
item.description: Start This is my first testing post with the hugo framework.

item.title: About
item.description: Me and Wolfgangsee in background (2019) Currently I’m working as a Senior Portfolio Manager at Allianz Global Investors . My focus is managing discretionary Global Corporate Portfolios. I joined AllianzGI in 2016 and have been in the same team since. From 2012 to 2016 I worked as a Rating Analyst at Moody’s in Structured Finance department. I have been involved in rating Covered Bonds of mainly European banks. I worked at Siemens as a Software Development Engineer between 2006 and 2008, and again between 2010 and 2012.
